column4: wouldn't it be better if ubuntu came with google chrome rather than firefox?
wouldn't it be better if ubuntu came with google chrome rather than firefox?
anyone?
yes or no?
maybe they don't want ubuntu users being spied on :)
what do you mean?
we were discussing why ubuntu on a mac would be any different
I mean why do you think google chrome spies on ubuntu users????
that's a bit offtopic for this channel, but do some research
manually editing the source of chromium and/or using iron?
no its in the options menu :P
i wouldn't trust something like that in a proprietary program
why
because it's proprietary, you don't know what it's *actually* doing
but google is pretty trustworthy
chrome is chromium!!!
no, actually they are different
but they both are open source
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chromium_%28web_browser%29#Differences_between_Chromium_and_Google_Chrome
and how do you know the dude who wrote this in wikipedia isn't you?
lol, i'm not going to argue about it. do some research and continue in #ubuntu-offtopic
ok rofl
